QuestData.Title: The Weeping Wound
QuestData.Description: A beast, $n! I saw a beast. A great maw, an even greater hungering. They can't possibly know what they unleashed.$B$BIt is here. Its terrible shapeless body is erupting right into the Highlands.$B$BI saw you in my vision, $n. You struggle with the Earthen Ring to contain the beast. You will face the darkness.$B$BGo now, before the beast grows in power. Speak to Earthcaller Torunscar at the Circle of the Elements, northwest of here atop the ridge beyond the ruined Drakgor Encampment. Hurry!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Earthcaller Torunscar at the Ring of the Elements.
QuestData.RewardText: Welcome, $Gbrotha:sista;. You've chosen a harsh time to be joinin' us, but that is to our fortune. We could use ya help.
